title: Termination by eligible customer-generators
context: ยง269-110 Termination by eligible customer-generators. If an eligible customer-generator terminates the customer relationship with the electric utility, the electric utility shall reconcile the eligible customer-generator&rsquo;s consumption and production of electricity, including any unused credits for excess electricity from the eligible customer-generator carried over from prior months, for the period following the last twelve-month reconciliation period to the date of termination of the relationship, according to the requirements set forth in this part. [L 2001, c 272, pt of ยง6; am L 2005, c 104, ยง10]
